content: LankaTel offers various connection types: Mobile (Prepaid/Postpaid), Fixed Broadband (FTTH Fiber, ADSL, Fixed Wireless), Home Phone. New connections can be obtained at any LankaTel service center, retail outlet, or through online application at my.lankatel.lk/apply.

Documents required for new mobile connection: Sri Lankan Citizens - Original NIC (front and back). Foreigners - Valid passport with visa. Corporate - Company registration, authorized signatory NIC, board resolution. Minors (16-18) - Parent/guardian NIC and consent letter. All documents verified in-person at service center.

Prepaid SIM registration process: 1) Visit service center/retail outlet with NIC. 2) Fill registration form with personal details. 3) Biometric verification (fingerprint/photo). 4) Select mobile number from available options. 5) Choose initial recharge amount (minimum LKR 100). 6) SIM activated within 30 minutes. 7) Receive welcome SMS with account details. Registration is mandatory per TRCSL regulations.

Postpaid registration process: 1) Visit service center with NIC and proof of address. 2) Credit evaluation based on employment/income. 3) Required: Salary slip or bank statement (3 months). 4) Select postpaid plan. 5) Security deposit may be required (LKR 2,000-5,000). 6) Sign service agreement. 7) SIM activated within 2 hours. 8) First bill generated at month end.

Accepted proof of address documents: Utility bill (electricity, water, phone) - within 3 months, Bank statement - within 3 months, Tenancy agreement with NIC of landlord, Local authority certificate (Grama Niladhari), Employment letter with address, Lease agreement. Document must clearly show name and address matching NIC.

Check FTTH fiber availability: 1) Online at my.lankatel.lk/fiber-check - enter address. 2) MyLankaTel app > Services > Fiber > Check Availability. 3) Call 1234 with your address. 4) Visit service center. Coverage status: Available (order immediately), Coming Soon (register interest), Not Available (alternative options offered). Expansion announcements on website and social media.

FTTH Fiber application: 1) Verify availability at your address. 2) Apply online or at service center. 3) Required: NIC, proof of address, property ownership/landlord consent. 4) Select plan and pay installation fee. 5) Site survey scheduled within 3 days. 6) Installation scheduled after survey approval. 7) Standard installation: 7-14 days (urban), 14-21 days (suburban).

Site survey process: 1) Technician visits to assess feasibility. 2) Checks: Fiber cable routing, ONT placement location, Electrical outlet availability. 3) Identifies any civil work needed (wall drilling, conduit). 4) Confirms installation timeline. 5) If additional work needed, cost estimate provided. 6) Customer approval required before proceeding. Survey is free of charge.

FTTH installation process: 1) Technician arrives with appointment confirmation call. 2) Fiber cable laid from distribution point to premises. 3) ONT (Optical Network Terminal) installed. 4) Router connected and configured. 5) WiFi network set up with custom password. 6) Speed test performed to verify service. 7) Customer handover with user guide. 8) Installation takes 2-4 hours typically.

FTTH installation charges: Standard Installation - LKR 5,000 (includes up to 50m fiber, ONT, router). Additional fiber per meter - LKR 100. Wall drilling per point - LKR 500. Conduit installation - LKR 200/meter. Second floor installation - additional LKR 1,500. Promotional offers may waive installation fee - check current promotions.

Equipment provided with FTTH: 1) ONT (Optical Network Terminal) - converts fiber signal. 2) WiFi Router - dual band (2.4GHz and 5GHz). 3) Ethernet cable (2m). 4) Power adapters. Equipment ownership: ONT is LankaTel property (return on termination), Router ownership transferred to customer. Warranty: 1 year for manufacturing defects.

ADSL broadband requirements: 1) Active LankaTel or SLT fixed telephone line. 2) Line must support ADSL (distance from exchange). 3) ADSL modem/router (provided or customer-owned). 4) Telephone line splitter. Application: Call 1234 or visit service center with phone number. Technical feasibility check within 48 hours.

Fixed Wireless (4G/LTE Home) requirements: 1) Coverage availability at location. 2) Outdoor unit installation point (rooftop/balcony preferred). 3) Clear line of sight to nearest tower for optimal signal. 4) Power outlet near installation point. Application: Same as FTTH - site survey determines feasibility. Installation: 3-5 days after approval.

Installation appointment slots: Morning - 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM, Afternoon - 1:00 PM to 5:00 PM. Available: Monday to Saturday. Sunday installations available at additional charge (LKR 1,500). Reschedule: Call 1234 at least 24 hours before appointment. No-show fee: LKR 1,000 if customer unavailable at scheduled time.

Typical installation timelines: Mobile SIM - 30 minutes (same day). FTTH Fiber Urban - 7-14 days. FTTH Fiber Suburban - 14-21 days. FTTH Fiber Rural - 21-30 days (subject to coverage expansion). ADSL - 3-5 days. Fixed Wireless - 3-5 days. Enterprise connections - Custom timeline based on requirements.

For rented premises or apartments: 1) Landlord written consent required for permanent installations. 2) Building management approval for condominiums. 3) NOC (No Objection Certificate) from housing authority if applicable. 4) Consent form available at service center or download from website. 5) Portable options available if permanent installation not permitted.

Post-installation router setup: 1) Default WiFi name: LankaTel_XXXX (last 4 digits of serial). 2) Default password: On sticker under router. 3) Change password: Access 192.168.1.1 in browser. 4) Login: admin/admin (change on first login). 5) WiFi settings under Wireless tab. 6) Recommended: Set unique SSID and strong password. 7) Guide booklet provided with router.

Enterprise/Corporate installations: 1) Contact enterprise sales: 1237 or enterprise@lankatel.lk. 2) Site survey and requirement assessment. 3) Custom solution design (dedicated fiber, redundancy, SLA). 4) Commercial proposal with pricing. 5) Service agreement signing. 6) Project implementation (timeline varies). 7) Dedicated account manager assigned. 8) 24/7 priority support included.

Service activation times after installation: Mobile Prepaid - Immediate (within 30 minutes). Mobile Postpaid - Within 2 hours. FTTH Fiber - Immediate after installation completion. ADSL - Within 24 hours of modem sync. Fixed Wireless - Immediate after outdoor unit installation. Activation SMS sent to registered mobile number.

Common installation issues: 1) No signal after install - Check ONT power and fiber connection. 2) Slow initial speeds - Allow 24 hours for line stabilization. 3) WiFi not visible - Check router power and WiFi LED. 4) Can't connect to WiFi - Verify password (case-sensitive). 5) Internet LED red - Contact 1235 for line issue. Report issues within 48 hours of installation for priority resolution.

Mobile number selection options: 1) Random allocation - Free, number assigned from available pool. 2) Choice numbers - Browse available numbers at service center. 3) Fancy numbers (repeating/sequential digits) - Premium charge LKR 500-50,000 depending on pattern. 4) Number portability - Keep existing number from other operator (takes 3-5 days). Request specific prefix based on availability.

Mobile Number Portability process: 1) Request porting code: SMS PORT to 1234 from current operator. 2) Visit LankaTel with porting code and NIC. 3) Complete new connection registration. 4) Porting request submitted to regulator. 5) Current operator clears dues verification. 6) Porting completed within 3-5 business days. 7) Service interruption: 30 minutes to 2 hours during switch.

Installation cancellation: 1) Customer may cancel before installation date without charge. 2) Cancel by calling 1234 or visiting service center. 3) If cancellation occurs after site survey but before installation, LKR 1,000 fee applies. 4) No-show on installation day incurs LKR 1,000 fee. 5) Refunds for prepaid plans processed within 7 business days. 6) Equipment return required if already dispatched.

Post-installation follow-up: 1) Customer satisfaction survey sent via SMS/email within 3 days. 2) Technical support available at 1235 for any issues. 3) Free follow-up visit within 7 days if installation issues reported. 4) MyLankaTel app for managing account and services. 5) Regular updates on service improvements via newsletter.

Current promotional offers: 1) Waived installation fee for FTTH plans above 100 Mbps (limited time). 2) Free router upgrade with select broadband packages. 3) Discounted fancy number selection (50% off). 4) Bundle offers: Mobile + Broadband combo discounts. Check website and social media for latest promotions and eligibility criteria.
